docs.snippet: Following the inspection by the police, which has cleared away many of the sidewalk obstructions in the wholesale grocery, produce, and commission district, wrest of Broadway, down town, the Bureau of Incumbrances raided the Astor House sidewalk...
docs.lead_paragraph: Following the inspection by the police, which has cleared away many of the sidewalk obstructions in the wholesale grocery, produce, and commission district, wrest of Broadway, down town, the Bureau of Incumbrances raided the Astor House sidewalk yesterday and took nearly a truckload of trunks, valises, and traveling bags from the Vesey Street corner.
docs.abstract: Association of Manufacturers' Committee Leaves New York for Southern Trade Excursion

headline.main: RESULTS BEGIN TO SHOW; EFFORTS TO HAVE SIDEWALKS KEPT CLEAR EFFECTIVE. Bureau of Incumbrances Becomes Act- ive and Makes a Raid on the Vesey Street Corner of the Astor House-Trunks and Bags Carried Away and a Great Improvement made -- Mr. Callanan's Comments on Controller Fitch's Action.

docs.snippet: Those who see Chief of Police Peter Conlin nowadays in his office, and in his natty and becoming uniform as the executive officer of the Police Department, may have interest in knowing what he was like thirtytwo years ago.
docs.lead_paragraph: Those who see Chief of Police Peter Conlin nowadays in his office, and in his natty and becoming uniform as the executive officer of the Police Department, may have interest in knowing what he was like thirtytwo years ago.

headline.main: CAPT. PETER CONLIN IN 1864.; Present Chief of Police as He Appeared During the War.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, July 27. -- The party of American manufacturers which sailed from New-York on the 1st of July via Southampton and London, to visit the Argentine Republic, Uruguay, and Brazil, arrived at this port to-day on board the Royal Mail...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, July 27. -- The party of American manufacturers which sailed from New-York on the 1st of July via Southampton and London, to visit the Argentine Republic, Uruguay, and Brazil, arrived at this port to-day on board the Royal Mail steamship Danube.

docs.snippet: Edgar Schramm, United States Consul at Montevideo, has some very interesting information to give concerning the lumber trade of the United States with Uruguay and the Argentine Republic. Mr. Schramm says that this trade presents incongruities which...
docs.lead_paragraph: Edgar Schramm, United States Consul at Montevideo, has some very interesting information to give concerning the lumber trade of the United States with Uruguay and the Argentine Republic. Mr. Schramm says that this trade presents incongruities which cannot but be harmful to the lumber interests of the United States.

docs.lead_paragraph: Letters received by members of the New-York Produce Exchange from representatives accompanying the delegation of American merchants and manufacturers now visiting the principal South American cities, for the purpose of inquiring into the advantages offered by closer trade relations between the United States and the countries below the equator, contain glowing accounts of the courtesies and entertainment extended the visitors.

docs.snippet: Some of the members of the Committee of the National Association of Manufacturers who have been visiting South American countries to investigate the opportunities for building up trade with them are just now returning. Inquiries were made, especially...
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of the members of the Committee of the National Association of Manufacturers who have been visiting South American countries to investigate the opportunities for building up trade with them are just now returning. Inquiries were made, especially in Brazil, Uruguay, and Argentina, and the results are said to be promising.
